markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Refined Pesh](/Equipment.aspx?ID=626)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Drug" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=261" />
<trait label="Ingested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Inhaled" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=96" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 120, [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 52 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 2 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

When eaten or smoked, pesh gives users a sense of well-being, sometimes with hallucinations, aggression, and exhaustion.

**Saving Throw** DC 12 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 minute; **Maximum Duration** 6 hours; **Stage 1** stupefied 1 and a +2 item bonus to saves versus [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) effects (1 minute); **Stage 2** 1 temporary Hit Point per level (first time you reach this stage only), +2 item bonus to saves versus fear effects, [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3), and [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) (1 minute); **Stage 3** clumsy 2 and stupefied 2 (1 hour)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Refined Pesh

Stage 1: stupefied 1 and a +2 item bonus to saves versus [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) effects (1 minute)

Stage 2: 1 temporary Hit Point per level (first time you reach this stage only), +2 item bonus to saves versus fear effects, [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3), and [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) (1 minute)

Stage 3: clumsy 2 and stupefied 2 (1 hour)
